forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 4 to 8 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow before 5am, then rain and snow. Cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South southeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 4 to 8 inches possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 17. West northwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Has anybody been by HM to see if they are blowing snow yet? Ski hills in the area have been making snow for a few days now.

nubsNob.comments: The Lodge, General Store, Tune Center, Cafeteria and Pub are all open from 9:00 – 4:00 today, with the Michigan-Ohio State game on in the pub. Early season tuning specials run through today. Get your skis and boards in soon! The General Store also has many great gift ideas for the skier on your list. The lodge will be closed on Sunday, November 29th. Stay tuned for an announcement on an opening day to the ski season.
